_meanings:
{@--7@} (In <ab>Rhet.</ab>) A
figure of speech which consists in
representing the {%Upameya%} as 
superior to the {%Upamāna%} in some 
particular respects; {#upamAnAdyadanyasya#} 
{#vyatirekaH sa eva saH#} <ls>K. P. 10.</ls> ({#vyatirekeRa#}
means ‘except, without’; {#vyatireke#} ‘on
the contrary supposition.’).
